text: Thanks for this follow up post, Rob. The examples are really helpful. Maybe a RavenDB document design wiki would be useful, rather than the forums filling up with "how should I structure application X" questions.
Perhaps as the questions emerge we can come up with that - some of the standard document design guidelines are different with RavenDB on account of the drive towards added value functionality.
Thanks, perhaps more of these as more questions get asked :-)
Thanks Rob - this actually went a long way to answering my languishing question on StackOverflow.
I saw that earlier but am on my phone so...
This article actually gave me a eureka moment - I've got a bulk of my SQL data model mapped out into documents now. Next is testing how well it fits into my UI workflow
